mapper.select: SELECT no,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_tab,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_tab,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_tab FROM qnaBoard ORDER BY group_id DESC,group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnaBoard(no,id,name,subject,content,pwd,group_id) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM qnaBoard), #{id},#{name},#{subject},#{content},#{pwd}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM qnaBoard))
mapper.select: SELECT no,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_tab,group_id,group_step,anok,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_tab,group_id,group_step,anok,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_tab,group_id,group_step,anok FROM qnaBoard WHERE group_step=0 ORDER BY group_id DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
